title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\PredefinedSplit
name: PredefinedSplit
description:
Assigns input data to training, validation, and test sets based on the value of a provided key.

Supported only for tabular Datasets.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.PredefinedSplit

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.key
params.description: Required. The key is a name of one of the Dataset's data columns. The value of the key (either the label's value or value in the column) must be one of {training, validation, test}, and it defines to which set the given piece of data is assigned. If for a piece of data the key is not present or has an invalid value, that piece is ignored by the pipeline.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description:
Required. The key is a name of one of the Dataset's data columns.

Generated from protobuf field string key = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
